label: 享保の改革
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
見出し読み: きょうほうのかいかく
説明文: The first major revision" of the bakufu system [undertaken by the eighth shogun Yoshimune].  Proclaimed as a "return to Ieyasu's legacy," it sought to expand the bakufu's finances, clean up corruption in the land-tax system, and improve morale among lesser vassals of the shogun by betting their financial status (p. 21). [幕府、徳川吉宗、家康]"
